Title: [Regression] KYC Verification fails for valid passport
Repro Steps:
1. Register a new user
2. Upload a valid passport and proof of address
3. Submit for KYC verification
Actual: KYC fails with 'Document not recognized' error
Expected: KYC should pass for valid documents

Title: [UI] Portfolio dashboard does not update after trade
Repro Steps:
1. Login as MEDIUM role user
2. Place a trade in forex
3. Open portfolio dashboard
Actual: New position is not displayed
Expected: Dashboard updates in real-time with new position

Title: [Security] 2FA prompt missing on login
Repro Steps:
1. Login as EXCELLENT role user
2. Enter correct credentials
Actual: User is logged in without 2FA prompt
Expected: 2FA prompt should appear after password entry

Title: [Analytics] Advanced analytics not available for EXCELLENT user
Repro Steps:
1. Login as EXCELLENT role user
2. Navigate to analytics dashboard
Actual: Advanced metrics (win/loss, risk-adjusted returns) not visible
Expected: All advanced analytics should be available for EXCELLENT users

Title: [Notification] Price alert not sent to user
Repro Steps:
1. Login as LOW role user
2. Set a price alert for BTC/USD
3. Wait for price to cross threshold
Actual: No notification received
Expected: User receives price alert via selected channel

Title: [Mobile] App crashes on order execution
Repro Steps:
1. Login on iOS app
2. Place a market order for EUR/USD
Actual: App crashes after order submission
Expected: Order executes and confirmation is shown

Title: [Funds] Withdrawal fails for verified user
Repro Steps:
1. Login as KYC-verified user
2. Request withdrawal to bank account
Actual: Withdrawal request fails with generic error
Expected: Withdrawal should succeed for verified users

Title: [Performance] Dashboard loads in >5 seconds during peak hours
Repro Steps:
1. Login during peak trading hours
2. Navigate to portfolio dashboard
Actual: Dashboard takes over 5 seconds to load
Expected: Dashboard loads in under 2 seconds as per SLA

Title: [Compliance] User from restricted jurisdiction can register
Repro Steps: 1. Attempt registration from a restricted country (e.g., US)\nActual: Registration is allowed\nExpected: Registration should be blocked for restricted jurisdictions

Title: [Audit] Trade execution not logged in audit trail
Repro Steps:
1. Login as any user
2. Place a trade
3. Check audit logs
Actual: Trade execution not recorded in audit log
Expected: All trades should be logged with timestamp and user details
